title: High-resolution Mapping of Obscured Greenhouse Gases
text:
High-resolution Mapping of Obscured Greenhouse Gases
Carbon-I will quantify greenhouse gas (GHG) fluxes from point to global scales and deliver actionable data on emission sources.






Carbon-I fills the data hole in the humid tropics







The humid tropics are hardly observed by current satellites







CH4 emissions are heterogenous across the globe, highest in the tropics.







Carbon-I will investigate hotspots and flux heterogeneity globally.
